desc: Welcome to Mirus Toys! We strive to create toys that combine science and art, toys that are inspired by nature and nurtures the natural curiosity of the child, toys that grow with them, toys that are not only educational but are beautiful. Handcrafted wooden toys for children of all ages.

layout.text: We offer unique, beautiful, hand-crafted toys and learning materials, made right here in the beautiful PNW.
